Nimble Labs | Developer Internships | REMOTE (USA) | http://www.nimblelabs.com/ | Full Time

We are helping train people who'd like to become developers. Instead of spending $10,000 to $20,000 on a coding bootcamp, come work with us, work on real software projects and make money. While the pay rate is relatively low, compared to spending money and what you will learn it is a great opportunity for anyone wanting to break into software development.

We are looking for people with some aptitude for computers and programming, but not necessarily any experience.

You will be learning basic web development with Rails and Javascript (node.js and potentially Vue.js)

At this time we are only accepting interns from the USA. If interested, please contact me at harris at nimble labs dot com
